Package org.boardgames.crossway.controller

Class ScoreboardController

java.lang.Object
org.boardgames.crossway.controller.ScoreboardController
public class ScoreboardController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing player information and the scoreboard display.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScoreboardController

      public ScoreboardController(String blackName, String whiteName, ScoreboardView view, DialogHandler dialogHandler)
      Constructs a new controller with initial player names.
      Parameters:
      blackName - Name of the black player.
      whiteName - Name of the white player.
      view - The view used to display the scoreboard.
      dialogHandler - Handler used for prompting the user when player names change.

  • Method Details

    • getScoreboardComponent

      public Component getScoreboardComponent()
      Returns the component displaying the scoreboard
      Returns:
      the scoreboard component

    • handleChangePlayersRequest

      public void handleChangePlayersRequest()
      Handles a request to change player names and reset their scores.

    • recordWin

      public void recordWin(Stone stone)
      Records a win for the player currently using the given stone.
      Parameters:
      stone - The stone color of the winning player.

    • swapPlayerColors

      public void swapPlayerColors()
      Swaps player colors.

    • resetScores

      public void resetScores()
      Resets both players' scores.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(Stone stone)
      Returns the player associated with the specified stone.
      Parameters:
      stone - The stone color of the player to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Player instance for the given stone color.

    • refreshScoreboard

      public void refreshScoreboard()
      Updates the scoreboard label with current names and scores.
